frameDefinitions: An Entity is judged by a sound Attribute of some perceived level of Volume intensity.
This frame contains words that describe specific aspects of a Color.
A Cause leads to the formation of a Created_entity.
An Agent has completed an Activity. '' 'Finally I am done cleaning the apartment.'
An Entity has a particular scalar Attribute with a value exceeding a contextually-specified or generally-understood standard.
There is a gradable amount of light in a particular Location.
frameExamples: Finally I am <t>done</t> cleaning the apartment.
The small print was bearly readable by the light of the very <t>dim</t> torch.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the sound level <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under consideration. This role is incorporated in each LU in the frame.
A quantity or characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s sound output with repspect to its <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Volume</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Volume</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The place where an <fen>Entity</fen> is located.
The color that is being described.
The entity whose <fen>Color</fen> is being described.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces an effect. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s.
The <fen>Creator</fen> creates a created entity.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
This role identifies the <fen>Agent</fen> in a done state of an the <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> in which the <fen>Agent</fen> was engaged.
The point at which the <fen>Agent</fen> is done with the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> finishes the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Value</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Value</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The place whose amout of light is being described.  The <fen>Location</fen> can also be a location in time, as seen in the second example below:
The entity from which the light eminates.
listRoleExamples: Fornalutx is a jewel of warm <fex>stone</fex>.
She hid from the man in a dark <fex>corner</fex>.
A dim <fex>lamp</fex> swung over the entrance to the castle.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Department of HealthHong Kong CustomsLa Rose BlancheAsia Market IntelligenceNote: Pages
